data.lyric:
[ti:Sacrifice (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sacrifice (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:00.72]Lyrics by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye/Axel Hedfors/Steve Angello/Sebastian Ingrosso/Carl Nordström/Kevin Duane Mccord
[00:04.16]Composed by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Abel Tesfaye/Axel Hedfors/Steve Angello/Sebastian Ingrosso/Carl Nordström/Kevin Duane Mccord
[00:07.60]I was born in a city
[00:11.96]Where the winter nights don't ever sleep
[00:15.39]So this life is always with me
[00:19.21]
[00:19.81]The ice inside my veins will never bleed
[00:22.88]
[00:31.22]Every time you try to fix me
[00:35.40]I know you'll never find that missing piece
[00:38.97]When you cry and say you miss me
[00:43.28]I lie and tell you that I'll never leave
[00:46.87]But
[00:47.47]I sacrifice
[00:49.17]
[00:50.05]Your love for more of the night
[00:53.41]
[00:53.97]I try to put up a fight
[00:57.31]
[00:57.89]Can't tie me down
[01:02.08]I don't want to sacrifice
[01:06.04]For your love
[01:08.50]I try
[01:09.97]I don't want to sacrifice
[01:14.01]But I love my time
[01:17.76]
[01:26.37]I hold you through the toughest parts
[01:28.30]When you feel like it's the end
[01:30.33]'Cause life is still worth living
[01:32.35]'Cause life is still worth living
[01:34.41]I can break you down and pick you up
[01:36.14]And f**k like we are friends
[01:38.05]But don't be catching feelings
[01:40.15]Don't be out here catching feelings
[01:41.96]'Cause
[01:42.39]I sacrifice
[01:44.07]
[01:45.10]Your love for more of the night
[01:49.01]I try to put up a fight
[01:52.95]Can't tie me down
[01:57.16]I don't want to sacrifice
[02:01.16]For your love
[02:03.52]I try
[02:05.09]I don't want to sacrifice
[02:09.04]But I love my time
[02:13.05]I don't want to sacrifice
[02:16.90]For your love
[02:19.32]I try
[02:20.76]I don't want to sacrifice
[02:24.69]But I love my time
[02:28.54]
[02:30.11]Oh baby
[02:32.35]I hope you know that I tried
[02:36.60]
[02:37.98]Oh baby
[02:40.16]I hope you know I love
[02:42.95]My time
[02:44.29]
[02:45.83]I don't want to sacrifice
[02:48.62]
[02:49.72]I don't want to
